entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
